    Plot MI Network with Community Coloring

    plot_mi_network.Rd

    Visualizes a subset of an MI network with community coloring, labeling top nodes from each community.

    Usage

    plot_mi_network(
  g_consensus,
  large_communities,
  sample_size = 100,
  top_n_per_comm = 5,
  title = "Network Communities"
)

    Arguments

    g_consensus

    An igraph object representing the consensus graph.

    large_communities

    A list of communities, where each element contains the nodes of a community.

    sample_size

    Integer, number of nodes to sample from the graph (default: 100).

    top_n_per_comm

    Integer, number of top nodes per community to label (default: 5).

    title

    Character, title of the plot (default: "Network Communities").

    Value

    A ggraph plot object.
